entry.title: About
entry.content:
Welcome to this website!This is online notebook of Saitung Choi, who is studying in Nankai University, Tianjin.

In this notebook I will post my notes, questions, and thinking about Biology.

I believe that the 21st century is the century of Biology! Letâ€™s make biology greater in the fulture!

Best wishes for the learner of Biology Science. I am being with you.

STAND ON THE SHOULDERS OF GIANTS.
